MeasurementToolMetadata.Instructions: The questions in this scale ask you about your sleep habits. All questions refer to the previous two weeks.

srsq_1.Description: Do you have trouble getting up in the morning?

srsq_2.Description: Do you feel sleepy during the day?

srsq_3.Description: Are you immediately wide awake when you wake up?

srsq_4.Description: When I am at school or work for a while I have trouble keeping my eyes open

srsq_5.Description: Do you have enough energy during the day to do everything?

srsq_6.Description: I am active during the day

srsq_7.Description: I have to struggle to stay awake in class or at work

srsq_8.Description: I don't feel like going to school or work because I feel too tired

Levels.3: This happens more often than twice a week

srsq_9.Description: I am a person who does not get enough sleep

srsq_loss_of_energy_total.Description: Sum of the items comprising the 'loss of energy' subscale

srsq_shortness_of_sleep_total.Description: Sum of the items comprising the 'shortness of sleep' subscale

srsq_sleepiness_total.Description: Sum of the items comprising the 'sleepiness' subscale

srsq_total_score.Description: Global score comprised of the sum of the 'shortness of sleep,' 'sleepiness,' and 'loss of energy' subscales
